BcTextField.playgroundDocsDescription:
**Interactive Playground**

You can try all important features and props live.

- Label, helperText, debounce, minInputLength, cache, highlight, recent searches, keyboard shortcuts, grouping, advanced filtering, export/import, async validation and more!
- Change props from the right panel, see the result instantly.
BcTextField.errorHandlingAutoErrorState: Auto error state on API error

BcTextField.componentDescription: Material-UI based, highly customizable TextField. Appearance, status, loading, clear, i18n, async validation, monitoring, accessibility and more.
BcTextField.componentDocsDescription: Framework-level, highly customizable Material-UI TextField replacement. Supports appearance, size, status, loading, clear, password, email, responsive, and more.

BcTextField.onClearDescription: Callback when the clear button is clicked
BcTextField.onChangeDescription: Callback when the input value changes
BcTextField.inputPrefixDescription: Custom content at the start of the input
BcTextField.inputSuffixDescription: Custom content at the end of the input
BcTextField.performanceStory: Performance measurement with 100 BcTextField components in a large form. Render time is shown above.

BcTextField.renderHelperTextDescription: Custom render function for helper text
BcTextField.autoFocusDescription: Auto focus the input on mount
BcTextField.maxLengthDescription: Maximum length of the input value
BcTextField.minLengthDescription: Minimum length of the input value
